name: plan_wireframe
description: Plan the wireframe structure by defining sections. Call this FIRST to establish the layout plan before generating elements. Each section will be generated separately to ensure complete coverage.

title.description: Title for this wireframe (e.g., 'Homepage Layout', 'Dashboard View')

description.description: Brief description of what this wireframe represents

canvas_width.description: Canvas width in pixels. Default 1200 for desktop, 400 for mobile.

canvas_height.description: Canvas height in pixels. Default 800, increase for longer pages.

sections.description: List of sections to create. Each section will be generated in a separate step.

y_start.description: Starting Y position for this section

y_end.description: Ending Y position for this section
